citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on 30-
MAR-2023.
Contact was made with the licensee by the inspector upon arrival to the facility via phone. The licensee was out of state
and unavailable to return to facility within 60 minutes.
End Section

narrative:

MAR-2023. 
 
Contact was made with the licensee by the inspector upon arrival to the facility via phone. The licensee was out of state 
and unavailable to return to facility within 60 minutes.
